attributes.action: Help homeowners who are victims of cladding safety rules making flats worthless
attributes.additional_details: People are suffering. Going bankrupt- stuck in flats they have out grown and unable to sell or remortgage against the property they own. Essentially this is the biggest fraud to have happened and in plain sight. You need to help the owners of these flats - enable them to sell their flats or fix the cladding problem yourself, or order the construction workers to replace the cladding with immediate effect. This has been 3 years of hell. Enough is enough.
attributes.background: There are 2 options - either government relax the fire safety rules on high rise buildings and cladding safety (which will enable banks to lend against them) or the government needs to pay (get the construction company to pay) to replace cladding on these buildings ASAP to stop more people suffering

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Protect leaseholders from paying for cladding remedial works: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332674

Extend the Building Safety Fund to include non-ACM buildings under 18m: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550489

Implement select committee recommendations on cladding to protect leaseholders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550908

Extend ACM fund to include ALL types of flammable cladding in apartment blocks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301108
